examples: Find a hobby.
He should take up a hobby.
She spends her free time gardening as a hobby.
My parents always took an interest in my hobbies.
It started as a hobby and grew from there.
words.defineEn: an activity that we enjoy doing in our free time
words.defineVi: một hoạt động mà chúng tôi thích làm trong thời gian rảnh của chúng tôi

examples: That movie knocked my socks off.
The movie follows the book faithfully.
The movie follows the book faithfully.
The movie broke all box-office records.
The movie broke box office records in the US.
words.defineEn: a story that is told with a series of pictures that move and sound, shown on television or in a cinema
words.defineVi: một câu chuyện được kể bằng một loạt hình ảnh chuyển động và âm thanh, được chiếu trên truyền hình hoặc trong rạp chiếu phim

examples: Can you read music?
The music was far too loud for my liking.
Her words were music to my ears.
Set this poem to music.
That music really gets me.
words.defineEn: a series of sounds made by instruments or voices, arranged in a way that is pleasant or exciting to listen to
words.defineVi: một loạt âm thanh được tạo ra bởi các nhạc cụ hoặc giọng nói, được sắp xếp theo cách dễ chịu hoặc thú vị để nghe

examples: They play the guitar together during jam sessions.
She usually plays the guitar by ear, rather than reading the music.
He kept his guitar in his room and played music whenever he felt like it.
Unless you’ve got money to burn, these expensive guitars are probably not for you.
He loves playing the guitar.
words.defineEn: a musical instrument, usually with six strings, played by pulling the strings with the fingers or with a plectrum
words.defineVi: một nhạc cụ, thường có sáu dây, được chơi bằng cách kéo dây bằng ngón tay hoặc bằng miếng gảy

examples: The piano keys are black and white.
She finishes her piano practice at 7 o'clock.
The musician's fingers lightly touched the piano keys, creating a beautiful melody.
On Tuesdays, I have my piano lessons in the evening.
To play the piano/violin/flute.
words.defineEn: a musical instrument played by pressing the black and white keys on the keyboard
words.defineVi: một nhạc cụ được chơi bằng cách nhấn các phím màu đen và trắng trên bàn phím

examples: She plays the violin with grace and precision.
To play the piano/violin/flute.
They hired a violin teacher to guide them in their learning.
He taught himself to play the violin.
We gathered around as she performed a heartfelt solo on her violin.
words.defineEn: a musical instrument with strings, held under the chin and played with a bow
words.defineVi: một nhạc cụ có dây, được giữ dưới cằm và chơi bằng cung

examples: Swimming is second nature to Jane.
I'm taking the kids swimming later.
She's never liked swimming.
Swimming helps to improve our cardiovascular fitness.
She packed her swimming gear in a waterproof bag for the pool.
words.defineEn: the act of moving our bodies through water with the use of our arms and legs, particularly as a sport
words.defineVi: hành động di chuyển cơ thể của chúng ta trong nước bằng cách sử dụng cánh tay và chân của chúng ta, đặc biệt là một môn thể thao

examples: The soccer team has ten players on the field at a time.
They practice their soccer skills every day after school.
She kicked the soccer ball with her foot.
They had a friendly soccer match with their friends in the park.
She joined a soccer league to compete against other teams.
words.defineEn: a type of sport where two teams, with eleven players each, try to kick a ball into a specific area to win points
words.defineVi: một loại hình thể thao trong đó hai đội, mỗi đội có mười một người chơi, cố gắng đá một quả bóng vào một khu vực cụ thể để giành điểm

examples: I never gave a hoot about volleyball.
She joined a local volleyball league to compete against other teams.
We cheer loudly for our school's volleyball team during their matches.
We are learning the rules of volleyball to participate in a friendly game.
We watched a game of volleyball and saw the players spike the ball.
words.defineEn: a type of sport played by two teams of 6 players, who use their hands to hit a large ball over a high net while trying not to let the ball touch the ground on their own side
words.defineVi: một loại hình thể thao được chơi bởi hai đội gồm 6 người chơi, những người này dùng tay để đánh một quả bóng lớn qua lưới cao trong khi cố gắng không để quả bóng chạm đất bên phía mình

examples: Hiking is a great way to explore nature and enjoy the fresh air.
The bramble bushes along the hiking trail were filled with ripe dewberries.
She joined a hiking group to meet like-minded individuals and discover new trails.
Emily enjoys outdoor activities like hiking and cycling to keep herself in shape.
We followed the map's directions to reach the hiking trail.
words.defineEn: the activity of taking long walks in the country or mountains, often for fun
words.defineVi: hoạt động đi bộ đường dài trong nước hoặc trên núi, thường là để giải trí

examples: I look at tennis differently from some coaches.
She won the tennis tournament and received a trophy.
We played a game of tennis using a yellow ball.
The tennis player achieved a clean sweep of her matches, winning every set and advancing to the finals.
He likes watching professional tennis matches on TV.
words.defineEn: a sport played with rackets by two or four players, who hit a small ball backwards and forwards over a net on a marked court
words.defineVi: một môn thể thao được chơi bằng vợt bởi hai hoặc bốn người chơi, những người này đánh một quả bóng nhỏ tới lui qua lưới trên sân được đánh dấu

examples: The twins have two bicycles.
He hid my son's new bicycle until his birthday
They are buying a new bicycle for their daughter's birthday.
He painted the bicycle, and now it's as good as new.
He wears a helmet for safety when riding his bicycle.
words.defineEn: a vehicle with two wheels that we ride by pushing its pedals with our feet
words.defineVi: một chiếc xe có hai bánh mà chúng ta lái bằng cách dùng chân đẩy bàn đạp của nó

examples: Sports were not at the top of the list.
One swallow does not make a summer in sports.
Ice hockey is a beloved sport in Canada.
Friends shared a platter of crispy chicken wings with tangy dipping sauces at the sports bar.
Their approach to sports teaching broke the mold.
words.defineEn: a specific type of physical activity such as football, swimming, etc. that we do to have fun or stay healthy
words.defineVi: một loại hoạt động thể chất cụ thể như bóng đá, bơi lội, v.v. mà chúng ta làm để vui chơi hoặc giữ sức khỏe

examples: The children played games in the yard.
Three cheers for Sarah, whose brilliant goal at the last minute won us the game!
The game strikes a great balance between accessibility for younger players and a rewarding challenge for veterans of the genre.
A large crowd watched the game on Saturday.
Two could play at that game, smart guy.
words.defineEn: an activity often with fixed rules that we do for amusement or fun
words.defineVi: một hoạt động thường với các quy tắc cố định mà chúng tôi làm để giải trí hoặc vui vẻ

examples: My favorite video game is a racing game where I can drive fast cars.
My brother spends hours playing video games on his console.
I enjoy playing video games with my friends online.
We killed the time between trains playing video games.
Playing video games was meat and drink to John.
words.defineEn: a computer game in which the player controls the displayed content by pressing buttons on a controller
words.defineVi: một trò chơi máy tính trong đó người chơi điều khiển nội dung được hiển thị bằng cách nhấn các nút trên bộ điều khiển

examples: The newspaper has an entertainment section with movie reviews and celebrity news.
All newspapers sang from the same song sheet.
She reads the newspaper every day to keep up with the latest news.
I use the newspaper as a source for my research papers because it has reliable information.
The newspaper has a column where readers can write in and ask for advice.
words.defineEn: a printed publication or a set of large folded sheets of printed paper that contain news, articles, ads, etc., usually issued daily or weekly
words.defineVi: một ấn phẩm in hoặc một tập hợp các tờ giấy in lớn được gấp lại có chứa tin tức, bài báo, quảng cáo, v.v., thường được phát hành hàng ngày hoặc hàng tuần

examples: The magazine features interviews with musicians and reviews of new albums.
The magazine has an article about famous celebrities and their lifestyles.
The magazine keeps tabs on the latest fashion trends.
The articles in this magazine are a cut above the others.
I often read parenting magazines to get advice on raising my children.
words.defineEn: a periodic publication or a large thin book with a paper cover that contains news stories, articles, photographs, etc., usually on a particular topic, sold weekly or monthly
words.defineVi: một ấn phẩm định kỳ hoặc một cuốn sách mỏng lớn có bìa giấy chứa các câu chuyện tin tức, bài báo, ảnh, v.v., thường về một chủ đề cụ thể, được bán hàng tuần hoặc hàng tháng
